EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Today's call (1561482516.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Today's call (1561482516.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Michel,
I hope all is well with you today. I am wondering if you've had a chance to review your old orders or invoices to let me know what you purchased. I do apologize as I cannot find anything on my end. Perhaps you can send me a picture of what is you currently have and I'll see if I can conform. Thank you and have a good day.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
